Simply draw your new tab

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the Sketch It Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use.
The search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
